Articles.Content:
The sounds of space.

Pretty amazing to watch. (...or 'to listen')

Nothing to add.

(If anyone shared it before: Can't hurt to repost it.)

Edited February 9, 2014 by Ragor
Well... That is sort of unsettling o_o

What they are saying:

Jupiter: "Hey Earth... you dont look so good"

Earth: "Ugh, Guys... I think I grew myself Humans and I am getting a fever.... I feel so weak."

Moon: "Yeah.... I you passed it onto me already"

Duna... eh... Mars: "STAY AWAY FROM ME!!!!"

I don't like these facebook-pushed cool "sciency" stuff because they usually aren't true and just promote new myths. There is no sound in space because by definition, sound requires matter, closely packed particles which can bump into each other and oscillate in waves.

It's that "they were teaching you wrong" attitude that bugs me. It's like they're wrong because they were teaching you, rebellion because of rebellion.

The sound we hear in this clip are radiowaves (probably longwave) turned into sound, but for each second of this clip, I'm sure it was like at least few hours of recordings compressed into a short time.

I'm baffled by the struggle to avoid crucial facts. Things are just so instant these days. Oh, a clip, nice. "like!" - attention span is few seconds and the disinformation spreads like wildfire.

I don't think I can sleep tonight

Yeah, it was probably hours of recordings compressed into a few seconds.
